    • Constructor Detail

      • Runway

        public Runway(int time_takeoff,
              int time_landing)
        Initialize a Runway with a specified amount of time for takeoff and amount of time for landing.
        Parameters:
        time_takeoff - the integer value of time (ex, minute) that the runway needs to use for each takeoff
        time_landing - the integer value of time (ex, minute) that the runway needs to use for each landing

    • Method Detail

      • isBusy

        public boolean isBusy()
        Get the runway in use status from isBusy()
        Parameters:
        - - none
        Returns:
        The return value is either true or false, If the runway is in use by a plane - true. If runway is idle - false.

      • reduceRemainingTime

        public void reduceRemainingTime()
        Reduce the remaining time of runwayTimeLeft using reduceRemainingTime()
        Parameters:
        - - none

      • startUsingRunway

        public void startUsingRunway(char typeOfUse)
        Set the use condition for the runway and begin corresponding timer.
        Parameters:
        - - typeOfUse character is 'I' for idle 'T' for takeoff 'L' for landing

      • kindOfOperation

        public char kindOfOperation()
        Accessor method to Get the character representing the operational use of the Runway
        Parameters:
        - - none
        Returns:
        - returns the type of operation the runway is used for. returns 'L' if the runway is used for is landing. returns 'T' if the runway is used for taking off. returns 'I' if the runway is idle
